programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep622
programme.desc: Lifeguard Blaze! - Today, Blaze and AJ are on a mission to become Lifeguards. But it'll take four daring rescues to achieve their official Lifeguard badge and only the bravest monster trucks have what it takes.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper - Paddington leads a treasure hunt to find captain Green Beard's loot, but will they all remain friends and share? // Everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition and enjoy a special icecream prize, but teamwork is key!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom / The Ocelot's Tale - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! // A fun sleepover in Larimar's Museum turns into an adventure when one of the pieces of art comes to life.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Comet Cupcakes - The crew help Capt. Sprinkles find a flower to make his special cupcakes but when Escarlata steals it they must get it back.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep513

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep514

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep517
programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.desc: Lost Keys - After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep701
programme.desc: Sparkle's Big Rescue - When Crusher sends Blaze away with one of his latest cheats, Blaze's little sister Sparkle comes to save the day and bring her brother back in time so they can race together to win the Teamwork Trophy!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Mail Truck Blaze - When three big mail deliveries are needed around the world, there's only one monster machine who can deliver it all: Mail Truck Blaze! He'll swim across seas, climb mountains, and venture to the Monster Dome --because mail trucks ALWAYS deliver!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Rescue a Rescuer / Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - Mayor Goodway tries to help the PAW Patrol rescue Danny, but the pups end up having to rescue the rescuer, too! // A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep702
programme.desc: Pups Save Election Day / Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys - When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Baby Mayor - The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to? // The summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Chickcharney Island / The Lost Girl in a Canoe - With the help of their new friends, the Chickcharneys, Santi and crew must stop Pepito from stealing their treasured drum. // The crew meet a Chamorro girl with a broken canoe who has been magically transported to their ocean.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep219
programme.desc: Old Shark Bride / Swimming Solo - Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. // Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away, sending him on a journey to find the same superpower within: Self-soothing!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the caf, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Splash Park / The Crew Builds A Playroom - With their splash park plans in troubled waters, the pups have to get creative to cool down the town for the summer. // As the pups work on building a surprise playroom for Lucas and Lily, a squirrelly visitor causes construction complications.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep519
programme.desc: George's New Dinosaur - When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Fox's Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Spider - Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep316
programme.desc: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny - Daring Danny X is at it again! This time hes stuck in a tree over a deep canyon and is pursued by hungry bears.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep95
programme.desc: Tiddlytubby Party - Tinky Winky finds a party invitation and shows it to Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. The invitation takes flight and the Teletubbies follow it to find a Tiddlytubbies' party.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Drum - Dee encourages a friend to say 'drum' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see and hear lots of drums - a marching drum, a dancing drum and of course a drumming drum!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Hooper Dooper Land - Hooper and Helping Hand are building an amazing theme park: Hooper Dooper Land! The attractions aren't ready yet but the friends are so excited that Hooper decides to open the park early.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Cheesy Feet - Messy thinks smelly socks and cheesy feet are brilliant! But when it's Lofty's feet that smell, it's a giant problem...

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Monsters - When Jimmy Jones is too scared of monsters to go under the bed to fetch a ball, Monty tells him that there's nothing to worry about and wonders, even if monsters really did live under the bed, how they could be sure they would even be scary.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Camping - While on a camping holiday, Bluey makes a new friend named called Jean-Luc. Bluey may not understand him, but they find a common language playing and hunting for a wild Daddy pig.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep40
programme.desc: The Imagination Badge - When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep39
programme.desc: The Recipe Badge - The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep38
programme.desc: The Nature Badge - The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Wimbledon, England - The Go Jetters are at Centre Court in Wimbledon to watch the world's most famous tennis tournament.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Mums and Dads - When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Andy and the Glass Frog - Andy heads to Costa Rica in search of a glass frog to see how it looks after its young.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Grace's Favourite Machines - Grace looks back at her favourite land, water and air machines, but which will they be?

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep21
programme.desc: The Slimy Seaworm - Captain Captain discovers that someone (or something) has been eating her sandwiches and leaving a trail of yellow slime.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep22
programme.desc: The Shadow Badge - There has been a power cut, but luckily Duggee has torches for everybody and the squirrels use them to make shadows.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep21
programme.desc: The Collecting Badge - Duggee is cleaning his biscuit tin collection, and the squirrels are inspired to make their own collections and then display their precious things in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels are all hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Great Mosque of Djenne, Africa - Grandmaster Glitch is invited to Djenne in Mali, Africa, to visit the people and to see one of his favourite things at work - mud.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep37
programme.desc: Kinderdijk, Netherlands - The Go Jetters travel to Kinderdijk in The Netherlands to celebrate National Mill Day.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep11
programme.desc: Thomas in Charge - The Island inspector pays a visit to Sodor; when Thomas attempts to impress him, his plans lead to chaos.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Cloud Jam - Music Lady needs Sarah & Duck's help to return a music-loving stowaway back to the Cloud Tower.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Castle Scribbling - Whilst visiting a Castle, Sarah & Duck's drawings lead them to an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stick to the Trees - Nelly and Nora try to stick the Autumn leaves back on the trees.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Dog Loves Night - The lights in the shop go out and Dog and Pug share an adventure seeing all the nocturnal activities around them - bats, cats and foxes. Finally they see the night workers who are repairing the problem.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Clothes for Jimmy - The Kazoops are going shopping after Stan shrinks everyone's clothes in the wash, but when Monty is told Jimmy Jones won't be getting any new clothes, he begins to question why animals don't wear clothes just like humans do.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep10
programme.desc: It's time to look at old pictures - A photo of Gran Gran and JoJo's mummy when she was a little girl inspires them to take a walk and compare old photos of their neighbourhood to see how it has changed over time.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Good Clean Fun - The high point of a window cleaner's career could be a low point, if Team Tinpo can't help him with his fear of heights.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Scrub-A-Dub-Pup - Granny Po loves her puppy, but her puppy loves lying in a muddy flowerbed. Can the team help her out of this muddle?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Road Trip - Mum helps Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip, while Dad tries to stay ahead of the grey nomad convoy or risk camping near the toilets.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat! Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: The Making Friends Badge - The squirrels make new friends, play games and have a picnic at a Jamboree. They meet another group of young animals with their very own version of Duggee but everything they do is different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping, so they build a tent. Then the squirrels hear a scary noise outside the tent. What can it be? All sorts of things are imagined. DUGGEE!!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Hosted by Tony Armstrong this series uncovers surprising stories behind some of our most iconic Australian stuff. This episode looks at food including classics like the meat pie, Macadamia nut, Chiko Roll and Vegemite.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - To get to know a country, you have to know its food. A nation's cuisine reflects its climate, its history, its creativity and its heart. Our culinary adventure starts at the top of one of the most fascinating countries.

programme.title: Heywire Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Heywire winner Ceobahn has always felt a deep connection with the outback. Now she's part of a team of Indigenous rangers and ecologists managing land at Calperum Station.

programme.title: Compass Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - The Uniting Church faces change with the appointment of a new moderator, Reverend Mata Hiliau, the first Tongan woman in this role. But what obstacles does the Rev Mata face from within her own community and the wider church?

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Chris and Belinda bought the land next door to their existing house, just 3.9 metres wide: a tiny gap in a long row of heritage listed cottages in Sydney's Forest Lodge. They plan to build a uniquely sustainable house.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet a vegan chef who highlights texture and flavour in her plant-only cooking, and whose garden became a refuge during recent ill-health.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Stephanie Borys.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie explores the ancient forests and shifting sand dunes of Pemberton, Bianca breaks into the drag queen scene of Broken Hill and Aaron's language and dance is put to the test back home in Bamaga.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Chas and John are back by the fake fireplace in the fauv-val Office to take a deeper look at the 2024 Presidential race and the week's news in the US. There's only days until the first in the nation Iowa Caucus. (Return)

programme.title: If You're Listening Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - China's pandas are not just pandas. They're diplomats. In recent years China has been hostile toward the West, with the most literal symbol of their displeasure being the withdrawal of their pandas from zoos around the world.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In this summer special of China Tonight, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the historical events that have shaped one of the most fascinating and complex countries in the world.

programme.title: The World Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep17
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Canada Australian firefighters join an international team in a desperate battle to help combat the nation's worst forest fires in recorded history. An area of 32 million acres has been scorched in this climate catastrophe.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - When Kurt ignores the advice of his team, his muster begins to look shaky. On the cusp of completing their biggest job, Liz leads them to the finish line. Clarry is determined to meet the cattle target for his new clients.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep181
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Where is Australia at on the road to net zero? In this special summer episode of The Business, Kirsten Aiken looks back at some of the biggest renewables and green energy stories of 2023.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.desc: Sr. 22 - Dr. Niraj Lal meets the Australians leading the biggest change to the electricity grid in a century: the rise of renewable energy. Along the way he explores new technologies keeping the power on now and in the future.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In this summer special of China Tonight, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the historical events that have shaped one of the most fascinating and complex countries in the world.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Australian know-how transforming the care of buffaloes in Laos; and the young shearing boss recruiting new workers from all walks of life.

programme.title: ABC News Update Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The top stories from ABC News, updating you on the latest headlines and the overnight news from across Australia and around the world. Presented by Jessica Rendall.

programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Start your weekend informed and up-to-date. Fauziah Ibrahim and Celina Edmonds bring you the latest news, interviews, politics, culture, weather and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Everyone loves leftovers, so we're re-heating some of our favourite stories. Sam Yang and Annie Louey look at China's culinary delights and how reality TV delivers a serious message about the real threat of food security.

programme.title: ABC News Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Surviving Extinction
programme.desc: Australia has some of the most unique animals anywhere on the planet and also one of the highest rates of threatened species. We look at efforts to save five unique Australian species that are on the verge of extinction.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hopes for a change in fortune after a tumultuous year for sheep farmers, how sanctuary life is causing a critically endangered creature to lose its street smarts, and buckle in as we meet the desert daredevils of Finke.

programme.title: ABC News Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Former Home Affairs Minister and Liberal MP Karen Andrews has announced she will resign at the next election and in this candid interview she describes why Parliament House is the most sexist environment she's ever worked in.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Bricklayer Greg and his partner Emma tear down their South Melbourne laneway townhouse to build a 3-level home out of brick. They invite their extended family to help out with Emma's parents assigned the entire ground floor.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Richard and Denise own 14 hotels so it is no surprise that when it came to designing their new house in a prime location high up in the Adelaide hills, their inspiration would come from the buildings that they love.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2021 - Hard people for a hard land. Narriearra Station sprawls across 150,000 hectares in a remote New South Wales. After more than a century its becoming a national park rich in flora and fauna and Indigenous and pastoral history.

programme.title: Bradman And Tendulkar
programme.desc: Two of cricket's greatest players, sporting icons from different corners of the world. This documentary compares their early lives, stellar careers and dreams, uncovering striking similarities and never-before-shared details.

programme.title: ABC News Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Pacific: Summer Special Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories from the Pacific. We go to Solomon Islands where the legacy of WWII is still felt. Plus we hear from two Pacific music legends Jean Gabilou and American Idol winner Iam Tongi.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Mariam Saab presents the day's news and reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Chas and John are back by the fake fireplace in the fauv-val Office to take a deeper look at the 2024 Presidential race and the week's news in the US. There's only days until the first in the nation Iowa Caucus. (Return)

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Gail force winds tear across the outback. Kurt must prioritise the safety of his team. Liz Cook has her first time mustering as a helicopter pilot. Clarry lets nature do the hard work, using fire to lure and trap cattle.

programme.title: Designing A Legacy Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Designing a Legacy, architectural nerd Tim Ross travels the length and breadth of the country seeking an alternate story of Australia; one that shows how great design better connects us to place and to each other.

programme.title: Great Australian Stuff Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Tony Armstrong explores all the stuff from the land that's become iconic and recognisable as Great Australian Stuff - including the boomerang, the Akubra and the Permanent Pleat.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Just three people remain alone in the Tasmanian wilderness. They have no idea how many others are left, heightening the daily challenge - is the end a day away, or 6 months?

programme.title: Australian Story Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Love, loss and sailing the world solo: Jessica Watson takes us inside her amazing voyage as a teenage sailor, speaks about the grief of losing her partner, and a new feature film which has thrust her back into the spotlight.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Hopes for a change in fortune after a tumultuous year for sheep farmers, how sanctuary life is causing a critically endangered creature to lose its street smarts, and buckle in as we meet the desert daredevils of Finke.

programme.title: Four Corners Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - How consultants infiltrated government. Firms push ethical boundaries and cost billions of dollars with little transparency and almost no accountability. We reveal accusations of wasted public money and conflicts of interest.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather Ewart heads to Tasmania with two intrepid line dancers who are on a boot scootin' line dancing tour of the nation holding 'Hoedowns for country towns', lifting spirits and raising money to help others, along the way.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Just three people remain alone in the Tasmanian wilderness. They have no idea how many others are left, heightening the daily challenge - is the end a day away, or 6 months?

programme.title: Going Places With Ernie Dingo Ep12

programme.title: Heywire

programme.title: National Press Club Address Ep24
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Bryan Brown, actor and producer, addresses the National Press Club of Australia on the topic 'Staying Focused'.

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Financial fallout closed most of Australia's gaming studios between 2007 and 2015. But in the years since, indie developers have rebuilt the video game industry with a growing list of critical and commercial hits.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Pushing new boundaries in the alternative meat market.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep3

programme.title: Back Roads Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - For the first time, Back Roads leaves Australian shores and travels to our closest northern neighbour, Papua New Guinea. Guest presenter Tania Bale introduces us to Rabaul, a community with close ties to Australia.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Fauziah Ibrahim and Celina Edmonds, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Annabel Crabb meets Peter Dutton to find out what makes this former Queensland cop turned political hardman tick. No stranger to controversy, Dutton explains how a self-confessed shy kid became the Leader of the Opposition.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Landline: Asia Pacific Special Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In Fiji, Landline reports on the growth in beekeeping and the management of varroa mite, plus the surge in kava farming and new products for the export market.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep182
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - From PwC to Optus and Qantas, corporate Australia faced a reckoning in 2023. In this special summer episode of The Business, Kirsten Aiken looks back at the stories that rocked corporate Australia in the past year.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Many parents worry their children are gaming to excess and don't know how to deal with it. Psychologist Wayne Warburton says he can help, with an Australia-first program tackling problem gaming. Will it work?

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ardent collectors Kerry and Judy build a Santa Fe style mud house with thick natural clay rendered walls and exposed timbers, on a sloping bush block on Sydney's north shore.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Darren and Ruth have found a large patch of land near the Melbourne Cricket Ground. Hidden down a laneway with no street frontage, this secret garden will be transformed into a contemporary three-story family mansion.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Calls for change in a quiet coastal town after bushfire left residents with no means of escape, endangered baby turtles get a second chance at life, and Tiwi Islanders put on a football grand final like no other.

programme.title: ABC News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Heywire
programme.desc: Young people from all across Australia share their personal stories of growing up in regional Australia, as we bring you the best short films from the 2023 Heywire project. Hosted by Isaac Muller.

programme.title: ABC Evening News Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the latest news as it happens ABC News is the home of breaking news, compelling stories and Australia's best investigative journalism. Mariam Saab presents the day's news and reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Presenter Heather Ewart starts the summer season in the idyllic beachside village of Brunswick Heads in northern New South Wales and discovers the surprising joys of life in a holiday town.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Adam and Poh's Great Australian Bites Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - We want look at the ingredients of Australian cuisine. A combination of First Nations, Multiculturalism, and one of England and the United Kingdom's greatest legacies - the pub.

programme.title: War On Waste Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Craig Reucassel dives deep into Australia's waste crisis to sort the facts from the PR spin, meet new waste warriors, and track down fresh everyday solutions to help all of us do our part in the 'War on Waste'.

programme.title: Save This Shark Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Mick Fanning continues his mission by travelling to the world's shark hotspots, where he gets a closer look at the incredible apex predators.

programme.title: Framed Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A Picasso has been stolen from the National Gallery of Victoria and the thieves are making sure everybody knows about it. Who is behind these bizarre ransom notes and what have they done with the Weeping Woman?

programme.title: ABC News Video Lab Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2022 - The Video Lab team look into an experiment to see Dark Matter, and examine the space junk dilemma.

programme.title: China Tonight: Summer Special Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - In this summer special of China Tonight, Sam Yang and Annie Louey take a look at the historical events that have shaped one of the most fascinating and complex countries in the world.

programme.title: Going Places with Ernie Dingo Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Ernie explores the ancient forests and shifting sand dunes of Pemberton, Bianca breaks into the drag queen scene of Broken Hill and Aaron's language and dance is put to the test back home in Bamaga.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The Pacific: Summer Special Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - A look back at some of our favourite stories from the Pacific. We go to Solomon Islands where the legacy of WWII is still felt. Plus we hear from two Pacific music legends Jean Gabilou and American Idol winner Iam Tongi.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep181

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Chris and Belinda bought the land next door to their existing house, just 3.9 metres wide: a tiny gap in a long row of heritage listed cottages in Sydney's Forest Lodge. They plan to build a uniquely sustainable house.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life

programme.desc: This program gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia. It explains the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Direct Talk

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Ultrasound is emerging as an effective treatment for pancreatic cancer. HIFU uses focused heat to target and destroy cancer cells, and there is minimal harm to the body. We report on its potential.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
